@Twentyforty - thank you once again for your uploads, you truly are the best!

I was wondering, is there any way we can RSS just your torrent page and not the whole movie/tv show section ?

@Killjoy88: I strongly discourage use of RSS and automatic, non-selective loading. This is tool of Hit&Run leechers and I have blocked/banned over 500 addresses so far. Use of proxy doesn't help (I spot immediately early loading and mark these users to see for how long they will seed and it usually ends very tragic). I ban, without hesitation, whole providers, back-bones, countries and even continents. These users usually stay as banned forever.
Point being - do not RSS me. You cannot read Torrent-description that way (and it might be important) and it would put you in harms way, without special cause.
okay - thank you for the info!
